title: IFC, ADB, DEG Consortium invests $275 million in Fourth Partner Energy
description: Fourth Partner Energy Ltd. in Hyderabad received a $275 million investment from IFC, ADB, and DEG. With existing stakeholders Norfund and TPG Global, the company aims to expand its renewable energy projects to a 3.5 GW portfolio by 2026. TPG Global made a partial exit after the latest equity infusion.
